Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to information concerning services for human trafficking victims in Port Authority bus terminals
Summary: Directs the Port Authority to provide information concerning services for human trafficking victims in Port Authority bus terminals.
LawSection: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
LawCode: Amd Art 4, ยง1 of Chap 154 of 1921
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 154 of the laws of 1921, relating to the port authority of New York and New Jersey, in relation to information concerning services for human trafficking victims in Port Authority bus terminals
